definition: Yongding River to the West of Beijing
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

sentences.english: He gazed at the glinting , rippling ribbon of water .
sentences.chinese: 永定河，他盯着前方的一条粼光闪闪的水。

sentences.english: The Yongding River groundwater system in Beijing plain is located in western Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 北京平原区永定河地下水系统位于北京市的西部。

sentences.english: Winding its way through the northwest of Beijing, Yongding River is the biggest river in the city.
sentences.chinese: 蜿蜒于京城西北的永定河是北京最大的河流。

sentences.english: Sangganhe Irrigation District on the upper reaches of Yongdinghe River is one of large-scale artesian irrigation districts in Shanxi province.
sentences.chinese: 永定河上游桑干河灌区是山西省大型自流灌区之一。

sentences.english: Lugou Bridge was designed according to the feature of the currents of Yongding River.
sentences.chinese: 卢沟桥是根据永定河水流的特点设计的。

sentences.english: From then on it was known that the Cave connects to the River.
sentences.chinese: 由此人们便知道观音洞与永定河相通。

sentences.english: Then suddenly we saw the green Yongding River in the valley below.
sentences.chinese: 接着，山谷下碧绿的永定河突然出现在眼前。

sentences.english: The Yongding and Daqing rivers meet near Tianjin.
sentences.chinese: 永定河和大清河在天津附近合流。

definition: Guanting or Kuan-ting Reservoir in Hebei, one of the main water reservoirs serving Beijing
Ju River, to the east of Beijing
Nanhaizi, name used to refer to various places, including 草海[Cao3 hai3], 南苑[Nan2 yuan4] and the Nanhaizi Wetland in Baotou, Inner Mongolia
Qingshuihe county in Hohhot 呼和浩特[Hu1 he2 hao4 te4], Inner Mongolia
Qinghe county in Xingtai 邢台[Xing2 tai2], Hebei/Qinghe district of Tieling city 鐵嶺市|铁岭市, Liaoning
Tongzhou district east of Beijing, formerly Tong county/Tongzhou county level city in Nantong 南通[Nan2 tong1], Jiangsu
the Grand Canal, 1800 km from Beijing to Hangzhou, built starting from 486 BC
